entry.title: Turquoise Kids KN95 Masks - Updated Shape
entry.summary:
Vendor: Greensupply.com
Type:
Price: 14.95

TYPICALLY SHIPS IN 7-14 BUSINESS DAYS: All items ordered together will ship in same order.   

 Number of Masks Cost Cost/Mask
10
 $14.95 $1.50

 

Contact us for wholesale pricing

Sold in packs of 10, these turquoise kids KN95 masks are designed and made specifically for the smaller facial features of a child and have a unique and updated shape. Featuring the same 5-layer design and filtration as an adult KN95 mask, they have around the ear straps, an adjustable nose bridge and improved side cutouts that allow them to both seal and fit comfortably. 

Product Details:

  • Turquoise color
  • Smaller design for kids ages 5 and up
  • 5 layer protection
  • Filters at >=95%
  • Around the ear loops
  • Adjustable nose bridge
  • Updated shape

Product Dimensions:

Product Information:

  • 10 masks per package
  • Individually packaged
  • For ages 5 and up
  • GB/T 2626-2019 standard
  • Adult supervision required
  • Non-Medical
  • Made in China
Product Tests  Click Here

 

IMPORTANT NOTES: 

  • Use only under adult supervision. 
  • These and other KN95 respirators have not been approved for healthcare workers.  Please contact us directly for more information.
  • All product information and tests are provided by the manufacturer and have not been independently verified by Green Supply.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Greensupply.com
Type:
Price: 14.95

 Number of Masks Cost Cost/Mask
10
 $14.95 $1.50


Contact us for wholesale pricing

Sold in packs of 10, these blue kids KF94 masks are designed and made specifically for the smaller facial features of a child and have a unique "fish" type shape. Featuring similar filtration as a KN95 mask, around the ear straps and an adjustable nose piece, these masks provide additional coverage while maintaining comfort and can be worn for extended periods of time.  

Product Details:

  • Blue color
  • Smaller design fits kids faces ages 5 and up
  • Filters at >=95%
  • Around the ear loops
  • Adjustable nose bridge
  • Unique fish shape

Type:
Price: 14.95

 

 Number of Masks Cost Cost/Mask
50
 $14.95 $0.30

Contact us for wholesale pricing

Sold in boxes of 50 of individually packed masks, these disposable kids face masks feature 3 layers of protection with sizing for the smaller face of a child. With around the ear loops and an adjustable nose bridge, these masks are comfortable, breathable and can be worn for extended periods periods before disposable. Available in both black and pink colors. 

Product Details:

  • Black or pink colors
  • Smaller design fits kids faces ages 3 and up
    • Measures 15x8.5cm
  • 3-ply protection
  • Around the ear loops
  • Adjustable nose bridge

Product Information:

    • individually packaged
